https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/C1njwK4W4uXQCoK482lKDtcUvz.jpg A long distance call from a long lost lover makes her reminisce about their common past. She remembers the spring when they met in Paris, the riots, the vespa and the cat named Baby. A film about love, time and things that got lost along the way. Belleville Baby
